summary: Contoso Wireless offers internet service with speeds up to 1GB/s. They have several plans available, starting at $19.99/month for 10GB of data and up to 500MB/s of speed. New customers can take advantage of discounts and promotions to save money on select plans, and all plans come with a 30-day money-back guarantee. Cancellations and plan switches incur fees, but Contoso Wireless has an average churn rate of less than 5%.
